aboutMe.title: A little bit about me
description: Self-taught Fullstack developer since the age of 17.
Passionate about programming and web development.
In 2021 I decided to take the step of entering a fullstack development bootcamp to boost my skills and knowledge.
In November 2022 I got my first work experience as a software developer at Scalemote where I am still working today.
My goal is to continue growing as a developer and increasing my seniority.
